sentences.english: But his sons did not walk in his ways. They turned aside after dishonest gain and accepted bribes and perverted justice.
sentences.chinese: 他兒子不行他的道，貪圖財利，收受賄賂，屈枉正直。

sentences.english: The first teaching of wisdom at the beginning of Proverbs is not to be greedy of gain.
sentences.chinese: 箴言開頭所講智慧的第一樣訓誨就是不可貪戀財利。

sentences.english: And his sons walked not in his ways, but turned aside after lucre, and took bribes, and perverted judgment.
sentences.chinese: 他兒子不行他的道，貪圖財利，收受賄賂，屈枉正直。

definition: variant of 輾轉|辗转[zhan3 zhuan3]
forged book/book of dubious authenticity/misattributed book/Apocrypha

three principles and five virtues (idiom)/the three rules (ruler guides subject, father guides son and husband guides wife) and five constant virtues of Confucianism (benevolence 仁, righteousness 義|义, propriety 禮|礼, wisdom 智 and fidelity 信)
the State of Qǐ in modern Qǐ county 杞縣|杞县, Henan (c. 1500-445 BC), a small vassal state of Shang and Western Zhou for most of its existence
to transmit Buddhist teaching/chakram or chakka (throwing disk)
